item.title: Bitcoin and inheritance, a House of the Dragon story
item.description: Bitcoin and inheritance, a House of the Dragon story House of the Dragon is an American fantasy drama television series. A prequel to Game of Thrones (2011â€“2019), it is the second show in the franchise, created by George R. R. Martin and Ryan Condal for HBO. Beware, this article contains spoilers. Nobody is safe in the realm of the Seven Kingdom, known for the brutality and the trickery of its subjects.
